text: Silvana Mangano (21 April 1930 â€“ 16 December 1989) was an Italian actress. She was born in Rome to an English mother and an Italian father. She played Silvana in Bitter Rice. She also played the title character in Anna (1951). Mangano was born in Rome. She was married to Dino De Laurentiis from 1949 until they divorced in 1988. She died from lung cancer in Madrid, age fifty- nine. ==References== Category:Actors from Rome Category:Cancer deaths in Spain Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Italian movie actors Category:1930 births Category:1989 deaths
title: Silvana Mangano
